entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement support for pull diagnostic requests on additional files #62781
    17.4
  • Support RefEscapesAttribute to allow marking implicitly `scoped ref` parameters as unscoped #62780
    17.4
  • Rename operation should have a wait dialog #62777
  • Cannot get the size of a value tuple in the expression evaluator in the debugger #62776
  • Remaining work to get pull diagnostics + LSP fully enabled, and all push-diagnostics + error list code removed. #62772
    17.4
  • Improve error message for a `scoped ref` parameter returned by reference #62768

Closed

  • [Feature Extension] Pull Members Up Should allow multiple selection for quick action #55612
    Backlog
  • Don't report generator init failures as watsons #57315
    17.4
  • Rule listed as "csharp_style..." can change functionality #59263
    Backlog
  • IDE0029 results in a behaviour change when the comparison operator is overridden #62765
  • Removing unused parameters from operators is suggested #62767
  • [LSP] Support language experiences for roslyn options in editorconfig files #61154
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow for Parsing Lambda Default Parameters #62782
    Area-Compilers
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Allow lightbulbs to make text changes, even if an intermediary workspace change occurred. #62775
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize away unchecked conversions between nint and nuint types. #62774
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Fix NRE in nullable walker #62773
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62770
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unneeded 'using OptionSet = ...' #62769
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Rename `IPerLanguageOption` and `ILanguageSpecificOption` and add LanguageName property #62766
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up global options usage in tests #62692
    Area-IDE
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Produce errors for 'partial file record' #62686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix cref tags on generated VB's SyntaxFactory #62578
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix GetNext/PreviousDirective's handling of duplicate trivia #62760
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify `AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer` constructors #62736
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Find references to type-parameters used in object-creation expressions. #62752
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" #62759
    Area-IDE
  • Use actual equivalence keys, not loc strings to distinguish helpers #62740
    Area-IDE
